ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm we are transport masters and ultimate fast damage dealers! We deal damage fast so fast that no other class can competete with us in how much damage we can
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm we are transport masters and ultimate fast damage dealers! We deal
damage fast so fast that no other class can competete with us in how much
damage we can do in same amount of time.
This is useful when two groups contest a same monster a group with a wizard
will get it ehehe easy to see around besouse of so called kill stealing.
But as masters of mana eficents are Necros they with new patch do damage
twice as fast as before !! And they do much more damage then wizard for
same amount of mana.
I think that this is primary reason of fastering our spells in upkoming
patch to compensate a faster damage dealing by necros.

This comes from reply thet i got from a Verant about similar question.


Magicians get their damage spells every other level when a wizard get them
every level and they are slower in casting them then wizards are. Wizards
get many more diferent Direct damage spells class on every turn. Like a
Area efect AE, personal PAE, Bolts ect

At 03.20 27/06/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>
>I know that the purpose of the wizard class is to do heavy damage quickly.
>A friend of mine was telling me that mages do almost the same damage plus
>they have a pet to fight for them. He does close dmg to me now at lvl 20.
>He says at lvl 49 mages do lava bolt which does 950 whereas ice comet does
>1100. That is almost the same damage as the wizard. So it seems to me
>that there isn't much of a use to be a wizard if you can be a mage and do
>almost the same amount of direct damage plus you have a pet. So anyone
>tell me something good about the wiz class to make it worth playing them to
>high levels?
